name: AdvancedInstallerTool
description: Acquires a specific version of Advanced Installer from internet or the tools cache and adds it to the PATH. Use this task to install Advanced Installer for subsequent tasks
author: Caphyon

inputs.name: advinstVersion
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Advanced Installer version to acquire. If no version is specified the latest will be used. If a local instance (manually installed and registered) is already present this step will be skipped. For a list of available versions please see [Advanced Installer version history](http://www.advancedinstaller.com/version-history.html)

inputs.name: advinstLicense
inputs.label: License Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Advanced Installer license that will be used for registration.

inputs.name: advinstEnableCom
inputs.label: Enable PowerShell Automation
inputs.helpMarkDown: Configure your Advanced Installer project by using custom interfaces and PowerShell commands. This capability needs Advanced Installer 16.1 or higher.

messages.InstallNewTool: Cache does not contains this Advanced Installer version. Will be downloaded and installed.
messages.UseCachedTool: Cached copy of AdvancedInstaller exists. No need to install afresh. Cached tool location: %s.
messages.RegisterToolFailed: Failed to register Advanced Installer. Error: %s
messages.CacheToolSuccess: Successfully cached Advanced Installer tool. Version %s
messages.CheckToolCache: Checking if a cached copy exists for this version...
messages.CreateInstallerFolder: The c:\windows\installer folder is missing. Attempting to create it.
messages.UseLatestVersion: No version was specifyed. Using newest.
messages.StartComFailed: Failed to start Advanced Installer COM server. Error: %s
messages.InvalidComVersion: Skipping PowerShellAutomation. Unsupported Advanced Installer version: %s
